info.title: Simiko API
info.description: API documentation for Simiko - Student Activity Management System

img_photo.description: Profile photo (JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG max 2MB)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all active banners with associated feed information
Retrieve a list of all feeds including posts and events with optional filtering
Retrieve detailed information about a specific feed item by ID
Retrieve a list of posts only (excludes events)
Retrieve a list of events only (excludes posts)
Retrieve a list of all Unit Kegiatan Mahasiswa (UKMs) with their latest profiles
Retrieve basic profile information for a specific UKM

post.description: Submit a membership registration request to a specific UKM

message.example: You are already registered for this UKM

get.description: Search for UKMs by name with optional query parameter
Retrieve comprehensive profile information including achievements, recent posts, and activity gallery

description.example: Student organization for computer science students

vision_mission.example: Vision: To be the leading organization. Mission: To develop student potential.

description.example: Won first place in national programming competition
